text: Nabii Nuuc marih finqah Namri yamaateeh Nuufek lee goomaaxak tawqe waqdi, toh digaalâ mamuutih astay Nanu Nabii Nuucuh warisne kinni, lac kee alwaay, seehadaa kee haadak kulli qaynatak labtii kee saytiyá doynikit korisaay, ku buxah marak yeemene mara teetit koris kaak inne, fingitoonu waanamah digaalâ maxco kak tookomeeh elle nummatte mara akke waytek, ku marak yeemeneeh koo kataate mara doynikit koris kaak inne, Nabii Nuucû luk dago marak sa teemenem matan
